amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1251 which expresses the Sense of Congress on the conflict in Syria.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in House Report 113-108 to strike section 1251 which expresses the Sense of Congress on the conflict in Syria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 301 (Roll no. 234).
